segments.en: Hello, everyone, and welcome to EnglishPod.
My name is Marco.
My name is Katherine.

segments.cn: 今天我们有一节中级课程，主题是去海滩。

segments.en: That's right.
You know, it's a very popular thing to do, especially during the summer.
segments.cn: 你知道，这在夏天尤其受欢迎。

segments.en: It's hot.
You want to go maybe to the beach to lay on the sand and maybe get some color.
segments.cn: 你可能想去海滩躺在沙滩上，晒晒太阳。

segments.en: And also swim in the ocean.
Yeah.
Yeah, it's a nice way to cool off when it's really hot in the summer.
segments.cn: 是的，夏天热的时候，这是一个很好的消暑方式。

segments.en: That's right.
So we're going to talk about the beach and a lot of vocab that we find related to this activity.
segments.cn: 所以我们要谈谈海滩和与此活动相关的许多词汇。

segments.en: But before we get into the dialogue, we have a word for you on Vocabulary Preview.
segments.cn: 但在进入对话之前，我们有一个词汇预览。

segments.en: So the key word today here is jellyfish.
Jellyfish.
So jellyfish is actually an animal, right?
segments.cn: 水母实际上是一种动物，对吗？

segments.en: That's right.
It's a very dangerous animal.
segments.cn: 它是一种非常危险的动物。

segments.en: It's a small little animal.
So these things live in the water, and they often live in shallow areas, and they can sting you.
segments.cn: 这些东西生活在水中，通常生活在浅水区，并且可以刺伤你。

segments.en: That's right.
They look like little plastic bags with little strings attached to it.
segments.cn: 它们看起来像小塑料袋，上面有小绳子。

segments.en: And they just float around, and if you happen to touch one, it hurts a lot.
segments.cn: 它们就漂浮着，如果你碰到一个，会很痛。

segments.en: Yeah, it can be very painful.
So jellyfish is our word today.
segments.cn: 所以水母是我们今天的词。

segments.en: Let's take a listen to today's dialogue, and we'll be back in a minute to talk more about what's going on.
segments.cn: 让我们来听听今天的对话，稍后我们会回来谈谈发生了什么。

segments.en: Oh, George, what a beautiful day it is.
segments.cn: 哦，George，今天真是个美丽的日子。

segments.en: The sun is hot, and there are just a few clouds scattered here and there.
segments.cn: 太阳很热，天上只有几朵云。

segments.en: What a perfect day to be at the beach.
segments.cn: 真是去海滩的完美日子。

segments.en: The kids are going to have so much fun, and we'll be able to relax in the sun while they're playing.
segments.cn: 孩子们会玩得很开心，而我们可以在阳光下放松。

segments.en: It does seem like the perfect day.
segments.cn: 看起来确实是个完美的日子。

segments.en: Glad we chose to get out of the city and enjoy the nice weather.
segments.cn: 很高兴我们选择离开城市，享受美好的天气。

segments.en: This looks like the perfect spot.
segments.cn: 这里看起来是个完美的地方。

segments.en: I want to see an impressive sandcastle by the time we leave.

segments.cn: 去看看能不能找到一些贝壳或者抓一些小鱼。

segments.en: So now why don't we take a look at four key words that we have prepared for you today on Language Takeaway.
segments.cn: 现在我们来看看今天在语言收获中为你准备的四个关键词。

segments.en: First up, we have a very important thing to bring to the beach, especially if you're like me and you burn easily.
segments.cn: 首先，我们有一个非常重要的东西要带到海滩，特别是如果你像我一样容易晒伤。

segments.en: So this thing is called sunscreen.
Okay, sunscreen.
Now this is a liquid, and you put it on your skin, right?
segments.cn: 这是液体，你涂在皮肤上，对吗？

segments.en: And this protects you from the sun.
segments.cn: 这可以保护你免受阳光的伤害。

segments.en: So basically you put this cream all over your body to prevent sunburns, to prevent burning under the sun.
segments.cn: 所以基本上你把这种乳霜涂在全身，以防止晒伤。

segments.en: It's very important.
So it's called sunscreen or also sometimes called sunblock.
segments.cn: 所以它叫防晒霜，有时也叫防晒油。

segments.en: That's right.
Okay, very good.
Now we have our sunscreen and we arrive to the beach and one of the parents say, all right, we're going to set up camp.
segments.cn: 现在我们有了防晒霜，到了海滩，其中一个家长说，好吧，我们要搭帐篷。

segments.en: Okay, to set up camp.
Well, this might be confusing because as many of you know, camp, camping, this is an activity, but we're not actually camping here.
segments.cn: 这可能会让人困惑，因为你们中的许多人知道，露营是一项活动，但我们实际上并不是在这里露营。

segments.en: We're just going to be at the beach for one day.
segments.cn: 我们只是要在海滩待一天。

segments.en: So to set up camp means to organize or arrange ourselves in a place.
segments.cn: 所以搭帐篷意味着在一个地方组织或安排自己。

segments.en: So it's a colloquial way of saying we are going to organize the area where we're going to spend the day.
segments.cn: 这是一种口语化的说法，表示我们要整理我们将要度过一天的区域。

segments.en: We're going to make ourselves comfortable.
So you set up camp.
So not necessarily that you're going to camp there, but that you're going to prepare the area.
segments.cn: 并不一定意味着你要在那里露营，而是要准备好这个区域。

segments.en: So this could be used in many other different areas, right?
segments.cn: 所以这可以在许多其他地方使用，对吧？

segments.en: That's right.

segments.cn: 所以有时，当热门音乐会的门票开售时，人们会提前排队几天才能买到票。

segments.en: Well, if you're in line, you maybe want to set up camp.
segments.cn: 如果你在排队，你可能想搭帐篷。

segments.en: That means make yourself comfortable, sit down, bring a book, open some food packages.
segments.cn: 这意味着让自己舒适，坐下，带一本书，打开一些食物包装。

segments.en: Right.
Exactly.

segments.cn: 当我们去海滩时，我们想坐下或躺在沙滩上。

segments.en: And in order to do this, we usually bring along beach towels.

segments.en: Basically, a piece of cloth that you use to dry yourself.
segments.cn: 基本上，是用来擦干自己的布块。

segments.en: But the special kind of towel we bring to the beach is called, of course, a beach towel.

Okay.

segments.cn: 所以也许你躺在这块大而舒适的海滩毛巾上，担心在阳光下待太久。

segments.en: That's right.

segments.cn: 没错，所以飞盘通常是由塑料制成的，像一个盘子，非常轻，你把它扔给你的朋友，它在空中飞翔。

segments.cn: 但如果水很多，也许你游泳时无法触碰到地面，我们称之为深水。

segments.cn: 这是一块沙子，基本上在水中升得很高。

segments.en: So usually when you're on the beach and you go into the water and it gets deeper and deeper and then all of a sudden it gets high again and there's more sand.
segments.cn: 所以通常当你在海滩上，走进水中，水越来越深，然后突然又高起来，有更多的沙子。

segments.cn: 所以你可以站在的那部分，水中的沙子，叫做沙洲。

segments.en: It's almost like a little island.

segments.cn: 正如你所说，通常水会越来越深，然后你有沙洲，所以它又高了。

segments.cn: 但通常如果你越过沙洲，水会突然变得很深。

segments.cn: 所以这是给孩子们穿的非常常见的东西，因为他们不会游泳。

segments.en: You put them little floaties on their arms or around their stomachs and then they can just float and they won't drown.

Floaties.
